items.name: The Lekki Arts Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant new multi-disciplinary creative space featuring contemporary Nigerian art exhibitions, workshops, and a boutique cafe, fostering artistic expression.
items.address: Plot 12, Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: SkyLounge Lagos
items.short_description: Perched atop a new skyscraper in Eko Atlantic, this luxurious rooftop bar offers panoramic city views, signature cocktails, and vibrant live music nights.
items.address: Eko Pearl Towers, Ahmadu Bello Way, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: The Urban Oasis Park
items.short_description: A recently redeveloped green space offering serene walking trails, family-friendly play areas, and an outdoor amphitheater for community events, perfect for urban escape.

items.name: Kulture Kitchen & Market
items.short_description: A unique food hall concept showcasing diverse Nigerian culinary traditions alongside a bustling artisanal market selling local produce and crafts, a true taste of Lagos.

items.name: The Arcade Hub Yaba
items.short_description: Lagos's premier gaming lounge, opened recently, with state-of-the-art consoles, immersive VR experiences, and a competitive esports arena, popular with young adults.

items.name: Lagos Waterfront Promenade
items.short_description: A newly constructed scenic walkway along the Lagos lagoon, perfect for evening strolls, jogging, and enjoying breathtaking sunsets over the city skyline.
items.address: Off Ozumba Mbadiwe Avenue, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: Noir Cinema & Bistro
items.short_description: A luxurious boutique cinema offering an intimate movie-watching experience with plush seating, gourmet snacks, and a sophisticated pre-show bistro, redefined luxury entertainment.
items.address: Block 7, Plot 10, Bishop Aboyade Cole St, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: The Zen Wellness Centre
items.short_description: A tranquil sanctuary offering holistic wellness services including spa treatments, yoga classes, and a healthy eating cafe, providing an urban escape for rejuvenation.
items.address: 3 Fola Osibo St, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Tech & Innovation Hub Lagos
items.short_description: A collaborative co-working space and event venue fostering Lagos's burgeoning tech scene, hosting hackathons, workshops, and startup pitches since its recent opening.
items.address: Herbert Macaulay Way, Alagomeji, Yaba, Lagos

items.name: AfroFusion Live
items.short_description: A dynamic new live music venue dedicated to showcasing contemporary African music, from Afrobeats to Highlife, with a lively bar and dance floor for unforgettable nights.
items.address: Plot 1410 Adetokunbo Ademola St, Victoria Island, Lagos
